title: England have had a four-year focus on final - all the pain will be worth it if they win
text:
When Eddie Jones first addressed us as a squad, we were in a pretty dark place coming out of the World Cup. We had lost a lot of belief in ourselves. Confidence was shot.

I will always remember him saying: “I look around this room and I genuinely believe this group of players can win the World Cup in four years’ time. I think you can be the best team in the world and it will change your lives and your families’ lives forever.”

Just those few words gave the whole room a massive lift. He made us believe in a way we never really had before. Obviously any coach can tell you: “We can win the World Cup,” but when it comes from someone who has been there, done it and got the T-shirt, it means so much...
description: When Eddie Jones first addressed us as a squad, we were in a pretty dark place coming out of the World Cup.
